scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n server,client -c auto "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.dev:strict: concurrently -k -n server,client -c auto "npm run start --prefix server" "wait-on http://localhost:5000/health && npm run start --prefix client"
